item.title: Project 2: Monte Carlo Simulation
item.description: Problem statement : The goal is to modelize the propagation of photons through the skin tissue using a Monte Carlo (MC) simulation. Thanks to MC simulation, the measured diffuse reflectance and autofluorence are compared to simulated diffuse reflectance and autofluorescence spectra to extract optical properties of skin according to geometry of optical probe. Data source : Diffuse reflectance experimental data Autofluorescence experimental data Approach : Inverse problem diagram For MC simulation : Based on interactions light - biological tissue Each photon is independent Each photon moves in undergoing events of probability of scattering and absorption For inverse problem : Determine cost function and optimization algorithm Extract the estimated parameters Technical skills :
